name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior ML Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I specialize in leveraging **Machine Learning**, **AI**, and **MLOps** to design and deploy high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. My technical expertise includes working with **Python**, **JavaScript/TypeScript**, and **Flutter**, and proficiency in frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. 

I have extensive **cloud computing** experience with **Azure** and **AWS**, having developed enterprise-grade platforms that effectively integrate AI/ML capabilities for real-time data processing and predictive analytics. I’m skilled in implementing **real-time systems** and **batch processing**, ensuring operational processes are streamlined and efficient.

With a strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I emphasize **code quality** and adherence to testing frameworks, ensuring secure application deployment aligned with compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I am adept at developing and deploying machine learning pipelines, serving ML models in production, and enhancing operational workflows using MLOps tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My background in **production monitoring** and automation through CI/CD practices allows me to build robust systems that meet evolving business needs.

experience.responsibilities:
Designed and implemented machine learning models for predictive analytics, including patient risk prediction, financial fraud detection, and document classification using **Python** (scikit-learn, **TensorFlow**), ensuring robust **MLOps** strategies for continuous training and deployment of models.
Developed AI-driven features like personalized health recommendations and smart financial dashboards, leveraging trained models hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker** to enhance user experiences.
Architected and maintained scalable data processing pipelines for real-time systems, employing cloud-native services including **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, optimizing for high-volume data ingestion and storage.
Established robust CI/CD workflows utilizing **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and **CircleCI** to ensure high code quality with automated testing, security scans, and multi-environment deployments, enhancing operational processes and system reliability.
Implemented comprehensive testing strategies using **Jest**, **Cypress**, **PyTest**, and **Postman**, achieving broad test coverage across unit, integration, and E2E scenarios for both front-end and back-end services, thereby improving code quality.
Built and executed MLOps pipelines using tools like **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Apache Airflow**, facilitating seamless model versioning, validation, and deployment across development and production environments under real-time and batch processing strategies.
Developed data visualization tools with **D3.js** and **Chart.js**, enabling insightful analysis of transaction trends and operational KPIs, further supporting data-driven decision-making processes in financial operations.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, to seamlessly integrate **NLP models** (using **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers**) for enhanced document parsing and financial anomaly detection, embedding them into core services via RESTful APIs.
Integrated advanced search functionalities using **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch**, enhancing user capabilities to query and analyze millions of unstructured and structured health records and financial documents.

Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, enhancing operational processes by **up to 95%** in detecting suspicious activities in banking systems.
Developed ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, improving real-time decision-making capabilities by **50%**.
Built and orchestrated ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling batch and real-time data ingestion from internal and third-party sources, improving data processing efficiency by **30%**.
Led the development and modernization of financial platforms by adopting a microservices-based architecture using **Node.js** (**NestJS/Express**) and **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**), boosting scalability and maintainability for high-volume transaction systems by **an increase of 70%** in throughput.
Integrated **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to establish a robust event-driven architecture, supporting operational processes and real-time event processing for transactions and compliance workflows.
Built dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **React** (**18**), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create responsive interfaces for financial dashboards.
Developed real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to track financial activity and generate actionable insights, improving decision-making time by **20%**.
Conducted rigorous testing and production monitoring to ensure code quality and system reliability across machine learning and financial applications.

Designed and optimized machine learning workflows and real-time systems for data processing in a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high performance and scalability across core modules.
Engineered AI and machine learning solutions using **TensorFlow** and **scikit-learn**, integrating data science methodologies to enhance recommendation systems and optimize operational processes, directly impacting conversion rates by **20%**.
Developed and maintained MLOps pipelines to streamline deployment processes for machine learning models, utilizing **Kubernetes** for efficient batch processing and production monitoring, achieving **99.9%** uptime.
Implemented real-time monitoring and logging solutions for ML models, ensuring high code quality and testing compliance while enhancing overall system reliability.
Leveraged cloud computing resources on **AWS** and **Azure** to facilitate scalable data storage and processing, resulting in **30%** faster data retrieval and analysis.
Collaborated on cross-functional teams to refine operational processes, apply testing frameworks, and ensure successful deployment of machine learning models within the e-commerce platform.
Utilized **Redis** caching for optimizing real-time recommendations and user interactions, significantly improving app responsiveness and user satisfaction metrics.
Conducted thorough analysis and optimization of existing machine learning features, leveraging data-driven insights to enhance algorithms and overall system performance.
Presented findings and recommendations to stakeholders, focusing on continuous improvement of ML strategies and business processes.
